sn35.154:1.1: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankami …pe… ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn35.154:1.3: Kittavata nu kho, bhante, indriyasampanno hoti”ti?
sn35.154:2.1: “Cakkhundriye ce, bhikkhu, udayabbayanupassi viharanto cakkhundriye nibbindati …pe…
sn35.154:2.2: jivhindriye ce, bhikkhu, udayabbayanupassi viharanto jivhindriye nibbindati …pe…
sn35.154:2.3: manindriye ce, bhikkhu, udayabbayanupassi viharanto manindriye nibbindati.
sn35.154:2.4: Nibbindam virajjati …pe… vimuttasmim vimuttamiti nanam hoti.
sn35.154:2.5: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati.
